GeneralInformation.School Vision: A gracious community of passionate learners and confident leaders
GeneralInformation.School Mission: Nurturing and inspiring students to love learning, lead confidently, and make a difference in the lives of others
School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Our philosophy: To bring out the best in every child
A: Adaptability- Being able to adjust to new conditions
S: Self-Discipline-The ability to control your feelings and actions
P: Passion-To have an intense enthusiasm for something
I:Integrity-Integrity is to live with moral and ethical principles. The students are to have the quality of being honest, fair and good
R:Resilience-Being resilient is to be able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
E:Empathy- Empathy is the ability to understand and share the feelings, thoughts and attitudes of someone else

We believe that every Bendemeer student will have a strong desire to achieve and to be the best that they can be and can be nurtured to imbue the ASPIRE values that will anchor them in the future world.

We believe that living by our school values, represented by the acronym, ASPIRE, will serve to guide Bendemeer students in their relationships and decision-making as they navigate through the complexities of life.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: Government School / Co-ed School / Single Session

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: We strongly believe that education at BPS is about nurturing the whole child. At the centre of all our endeavours at Bendemeer Primary is our student # the learner. At BPS, our core purpose is to nurture our students to be a confident person, self-directed learner with strong moral values and willing to serve and lead the family, nation and global community.
